title: Textile, 1901–50
medium:
Medium:  wool (mohair), cotton (weft)
Technique: plain weave foundation with supplementary warp (velvet). Pattern stamped or embossed onto cloth. Color added in the stamping process.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 68.5 x 66 cm (26 15/16 x 26 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Impressed 6-petal flowers in a diagonal arrangement.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1901–50.
1901–50. Medium:  wool (mohair), cotton (weft)
